articles.title: Heavy metals in Beethoven's hair may explain his deafness, study finds - Livescience.com
articles.description: A DNA analysis of Ludwig van Beethoven's hair shows that he likely had lead poisoning.
articles.content:
High levels of heavy metals detected in Ludwig van Beethoven's hair reveal that he may have had lead poisoning, possibly contributing to his deafness and other illnesses, a new study finds.
